task: Develop a basic 'Ultima' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Emphasize differences'.
name: Ultima Divergence

branding_data.short_description: Ultima Divergence is a unique take on the classic 'Ultima' series, focusing on highlighting and embracing differences within its world and characters.
branding_data.detailed_description: Ultima Divergence reimagines the classic 'Ultima' game with a fresh perspective that emphasizes the diversity and distinctiveness of its world. Players embark on a quest where every character, landscape, and narrative thread is designed to showcase unique traits and perspectives. The game encourages players to explore the nuances and contrasts between different factions, cultures, and ideologies within the realm. As players navigate through complex moral decisions and intricate quests, they will discover that embracing differences is key to unlocking the full potential of their journey. With a richly detailed world and a dynamic storyline, Ultima Divergence offers an engaging experience that celebrates individuality and diversity.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
